line.text: Tired with all these for restful death I cry
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As to behold desert a beggar born
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And needy nothing trimmed in jollity
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And strength by limping sway disabled
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And art made tongue-tied by authority
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And captive good attending captain ill
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Tired with all these from these would I be gone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Save that to die I leave my love alone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
